pr_title: Upgrade backend to Spring Boot v2.2.6, Spring v5.2.5, Spring HATEOAS v1.0.3

timeline.bodyText: Was there a specific reason to remove the "StandardCharsets.UTF_8" here ? Seems kind of strange to remove it.
timeline.author: KevinVdV

replies.bodyText:
@KevinVdV : Yes, this was required to be removed by the Spring v5.2.4 upgrade.  Please notice the comment in the description above where I said:

This includes the removal of MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_UTF8 (in favor of just MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON), as JSON best practices are now to only have a generic media type. See spring-projects/spring-framework#22788 (comment)

Because JSON best practices are to NOT include a character set in JSON files, Spring now no longer supports JSON files that claim to be UTF-8 (i.e. MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_UTF8), instead requires the more generic MediaType.Application_JSON.
So, yes, this looks odd. But Spring Boot & Spring no longer support the more specific UTF-8 JSON media type. They just support the generic JSON media type.  (But to be clear, Spring still supports JSON that has UTF-8 characters within it...there's just no support for specifying a charset in the content type.)
replies.author: tdonohue

replies.bodyText: Ok great, makes sense ! Just wanted to make sure this wasn't an oversight.
replies.author: KevinVdV

timeline.message: Upgrade Spring v5.2.4, Spring Boot v2.2.5, HAL Browser v3.2.5, Mockito 3.1.0
Updating code to Spring HATEOAS v1.0 compatibility
Correct Spring Security version for REST API. Realign related dependencies
Pin version of Jetty to same version used in Solr. Update IT settings
Ensure getRel() always uses value() to obtain String value

Remove jsonpath from Parent POM dependencies. It strangely causes JSONPath `NoClassDefFoundError`s in Spring HATEOAS during runtime. Removing from Parent POM (but leaving in dspace-server-webapp) resolves those errors.
Replacement for Identifiable interface, which was removed in Spring HATEOAS v1. Ensure any BaseObjectRest is referenced by identifier like previously.
Minor update to recent code based on update to Spring Boot
Fix dependencies in /dspace/modules/server.  Minor dependency reordering
Fix dependency convergence issue between dspace-rest and dspace-oai
Rename DSpaceRelProvider to DSpaceLinkRelationProvider to match HATEOAS classes
Spring HATEOAS updates for new code (after rebase on master)

timeline.bodyText: This method is new and potentially alter the existing implementation, Do you have identified a specific use case where this change is required? is this fixing an existing bug?
timeline.author: abollini

replies.bodyText:
@abollini : This was required by refactoring in Spring HATEOAS.  Notice this is a private method.  It's used by the two methods just before it to provide a valid input to the .slash() method in Spring HATEOAS (which changed its method params).
The thing that necessitated this was that Spring HATEOAS removed the Identifiable interface, which previously allowed us to pass RestAddressableModel objects (which were Identifiable) into the .slash() method and similar.  So, this private method is replacing Identifiable.  See this commit  967b9de and the changes to BaseObjectRest class in this PR.
